[30;1m463 | [0m[35m## Setting up the development environment[0m
[30;1m464 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m465 | [0m[35mOpen a terminal at the root of the project and run the setup script: `script/setup` This script will[0m
[30;1m466 | [0m[35m[0m

[30;1m509 | [0m[35m```bash[0m
[30;1m510 | [0m[35m$ pytest --fixtures[0m
